name: 陳澤明
objective: 先修課程：微積分或負責教授同意。常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式、拉普拉氏轉換、級數及傅立葉級數、線性代數及矩陣、積分定理。
schedule:
1	Introduction
2	First-Order Differential Equations
3	First-Order Differential Equations
4	Second-Order Differential Equations
5	Second-Order Differential Equations
6	Second-Order Differential Equations
7	The Laplace Transform
8	The Laplace Transform
9	期中考
10	Vectors and Vector Space
11	Vectors and Vector Space
12	Matrices and System of Linear Equations
13	Matrices and System of Linear Equations
14	Determinants
15	Determinants
16	Eigenvalues, Diagonalization, and Special Matrices
17	Eigenvalues, Diagonalization, and Special Matrices
18	期末考
scorePolicy: 學期成績=期中考x0.3+期末考x0.3+平時考x0.3+平時成績x0.1
materials:
Advanced Engineering Mathematics
Tenth Edition
